message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think you'll really like it. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $110?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I can do $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great product and I think you'll really like it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle again?
